query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
1 Luogo è in inferno detto Malebolge, 2 tutto di pietra di color ferrigno, 3 come la cerchia che dintorno il volge.
query.result:
**English:**
1 There is a place in Hell called Malebolge, 2 all of stone of a ferrous color, 3 like the circle that surrounds it.
**Malay:**
1 Ada sebuah tempat di Neraka yang disebut Malebolge, 2 seluruhnya dari batu berwarna besi, 3 seperti lingkaran yang mengelilinginya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
4 Nel dritto mezzo del campo maligno 5 vaneggia un pozzo assai largo e profondo, 6 di cui suo loco dicerò l’ordigno.
query.result:
**English:**
4 In the direct middle of the evil field 5 there raves a well, very wide and deep, 6 of which I will tell the structure in its place.
**Malay:**
4 Di tengah-tengah padang yang jahat 5 mengoceh sebuah sumur yang sangat lebar dan dalam, 6 yang strukturnya akan kuceritakan nanti.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
7 Quel cinghio che rimane adunque è tondo 8 tra ’l pozzo e ’l piè de l’alta ripa dura, 9 e ha distinto in dieci valli il fondo.
query.result:
**English:**
7 That belt which remains is therefore round 8 between the well and the foot of the hard, high bank, 9 and it has divided the bottom into ten valleys.
**Malay:**
7 Sabuk yang tersisa itu bulat 8 di antara sumur dan kaki tebing tinggi yang keras, 9 dan telah membagi dasar menjadi sepuluh lembah.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
10 Quale, dove per guardia de le mura 11 più e più fossi cingon li castelli, 12 la parte dove son rende figura,
13 tale imagine quivi facean quelli; 14 e come a tai fortezze da’ lor sogli 15 a la ripa di fuor son ponticelli,
16 così da imo de la roccia scogli 17 movien che ricidien li argini e ’ fossi 18 infino al pozzo che i tronca e raccogli.
query.result:
**English:**
10 Like where for guarding of the walls 11 more and more moats encircle the castles, 12 the part where they are gives the appearance,
13 such an image those made there; 14 and as to such fortresses from their thresholds 15 to the bank outside there are little bridges,
16 so from the foot of the rock cliffs 17 moved that cut off the banks and moats 18 down to the pit that cuts them off and collects them.
**Malay:**
10 Seperti di mana untuk menjaga tembok-tembok 11 parit yang semakin banyak mengelilingi istana-istana, 12 bagian di mana mereka berada memberikan penampakan,
13 gambaran seperti itu dibuat oleh mereka di sana; 14 dan seperti ke benteng-benteng tersebut dari ambang pintu mereka 15 ke tepi di luar sana ada jembatan-jembatan kecil,
16 maka dari kaki tebing-tebing batu 17 bergerak yang memotong tepi-tepi dan parit-parit 18 hingga ke lubang yang memotong dan mengumpulkannya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
19 In questo luogo, de la schiena scossi 20 di Gerïon, trovammoci; e ’l poeta 21 tenne a sinistra, e io dietro mi mossi.
query.result:
**English:**
19 In this place, from the back we slid down 20 of Geryon, we found ourselves; and the poet 21 kept to the left, and I moved behind him.
**Malay:**
19 Di tempat ini, dari punggung kami meluncur turun 20 dari Gerïon, kami menemukan diri kami; dan penyair 21 tetap di sebelah kiri, dan aku bergerak di belakangnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
22 A la man destra vidi nova pieta, 23 novo tormento e novi frustatori, 24 di che la prima bolgia era repleta.
query.result:
**English:**
22 On the right hand I saw a new woe, 23 a new torment and new tormentors, 24 with which the first ditch was replete.
**Malay:**
22 Di sebelah kanan kulihat kesedihan baru, 23 siksaan baru dan penyiksa baru, 24 yang dengannya parit pertama itu penuh.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
25 Nel fondo erano ignudi i peccatori; 26 dal mezzo in qua ci venien verso ’l volto, 27 di là con noi, ma con passi maggiori,
28 come i Roman per l’essercito molto, 29 l’anno del giubileo, su per lo ponte 30 hanno a passar la gente modo colto,
31 che da l’un lato tutti hanno la fronte 32 verso ’l castello e vanno a Santo Pietro, 33 da l’altra sponda vanno verso ’l monte.
query.result:
**English:**
25 At the bottom, the sinners were naked; 26 from the middle on, they came towards us, 27 on the other side with us, but with greater strides,
28 like the Romans during the great jubilee, 29 in the year of the jubilee, over the bridge 30 they have to pass the people in a collected manner,
31 so that on one side they all have their foreheads 32 towards the castle and go to Saint Peter's, 33 on the other side they go towards the mountain.
**Malay:**
25 Di dasar, para pendosa telanjang; 26 dari tengah ke mari mereka datang ke arah wajah kami, 27 di seberang sana bersama kami, tetapi dengan langkah yang lebih besar,
28 seperti orang-orang Romawi selama perayaan besar, 29 pada tahun perayaan besar, di atas jembatan 30 mereka harus melewati orang-orang dengan cara yang teratur,
31 sehingga di satu sisi mereka semua memiliki dahi 32 ke arah kastil dan pergi ke Santo Petrus, 33 di sisi lain mereka pergi ke arah gunung.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
34 Di qua, di là, su per lo sasso tetro 35 vidi demon cornuti con gran ferze, 36 che li battien crudelmente di retro.
query.result:
**English:**
34 Here, there, over the gloomy rock 35 I saw horned demons with great scourges, 36 who beat them cruelly from behind.
**Malay:**
34 Di sini, di sana, di atas batu yang suram 35 kulihat iblis-iblis bertanduk dengan cambuk besar, 36 yang mencambuk mereka dengan kejam dari belakang.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
37 Ahi come facean lor levar le berze 38 a le prime percosse! già nessuno 39 le seconde aspettava né le terze.
query.result:
**English:**
37 Alas, how the cranes made them lift up 38 at the first blows! Already no one 39 awaited the second or the third.
**Malay:**
37 Aduhai, betapa bangau-bangau itu membuat mereka mengangkat 38 pada pukulan pertama! Sudah tidak seorang pun 39 menunggu yang kedua atau yang ketiga.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
40 Mentr’ io andava, li occhi miei in uno 41 furo scontrati; e io sì tosto dissi: 42 «Già di veder costui non son digiuno».
query.result:
**English:**
40 While I was going, my eyes in one 41 were met; and I said so quickly: 42 "I am not fasting from seeing this one anymore".
**Malay:**
40 Ketika aku berjalan, mataku pada satu 41 bertemu; dan aku berkata dengan cepat: 42 "Aku tidak berpuasa dari melihat orang ini lagi".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
43 Per ch’ïo a figurarlo i piedi affissi; 44 e ’l dolce duca meco si ristette, 45 e assentio ch’alquanto in dietro gissi.
query.result:
**English:**
43 So that I, to describe it, fixed my feet; 44 and the gentle guide stopped with me, 45 and agreed that I should go back a little.
**Malay:**
43 Sehingga aku, untuk menggambarkannya, menghentikan kakiku; 44 dan pemandu yang lembut itu berhenti bersamaku, 45 dan setuju agar aku mundur sedikit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
46 E quel frustato celar si credette 47 bassando ’l viso; ma poco li valse, 48 ch’io dissi: «O tu che l’occhio a terra gette,
49 se le fazion che porti non son false, 50 Venedico se’ tu Caccianemico.
query.result:
**English:**
46 And that friar thought to hide himself 47 by lowering his face; but it availed him little, 48 for I said: "O you who cast your eyes to the ground,
49 if the features that you bear are not false, 50 you are Venetico Caccianemico.
**Malay:**
46 Dan biarawan itu berpikir untuk menyembunyikan dirinya 47 dengan menundukkan wajahnya; tetapi itu tidak banyak membantunya, 48 karena aku berkata: "Hai kamu yang menundukkan pandanganmu ke tanah,
49 jika ciri-ciri yang kamu miliki itu tidak palsu, 50 kamu adalah Venetico Caccianemico.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
51 Ma che ti mena a sì pungenti salse?».
52 Ed elli a me: «Mal volontier lo dico; 53 ma sforzami la tua chiara favella, 54 che mi fa sovvenir del mondo antico.
query.result:
**English:**
51 But what leads you to such sharp trials?».
52 And he to me: «I am reluctant to say it; 53 but your clear speech compels me, 54 which reminds me of the ancient world.
**Malay:**
51 Tetapi apa yang membawamu ke ujian yang begitu tajam?».
52 Dan dia kepadaku: «Aku enggan mengatakannya; 53 tetapi ucapanmu yang jelas memaksaku, 54 yang mengingatkanku pada dunia kuno.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
55 I’ fui colui che la Ghisolabella 56 condussi a far la voglia del marchese, 57 come che suoni la sconcia novella.
query.result:
**English:**
55 I was the one who led Ghisolabella 56 to do the will of the marquis, 57 however the scandalous story may sound.
**Malay:**
55 Akulah orang yang membawa Ghisolabella 56 untuk melakukan keinginan sang marquis, 57 betapapun memalukannya cerita itu terdengar.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
58 E non pur io qui piango bolognese; 59 anzi n’è questo loco tanto pieno, 60 che tante lingue non son ora apprese
61 a dicer ‘sipa’ tra Sàvena e Reno; 62 e se di ciò vuoi fede o testimonio, 63 rècati a mente il nostro avaro seno».
query.result:
**English:**
58 And not only do I, a Bolognese, weep here; 59 on the contrary, this place is so full of them, 60 that so many tongues are not now learned
61 to say “yes” between the Savena and the Reno; 62 and if you want proof or testimony of this, 63 call to mind our avaricious nature.
**Malay:**
58 Dan bukan hanya aku di sini yang menangis sebagai orang Bologna; 59 bahkan tempat ini begitu penuh dengan mereka, 60 sehingga begitu banyak bahasa yang tidak dipelajari sekarang
61 untuk mengatakan "ya" antara Savena dan Reno; 62 dan jika Anda menginginkan bukti atau kesaksian tentang ini, 63 ingatlah sifat kikir kita.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
64 Così parlando il percosse un demonio 65 de la sua scurïada, e disse: «Via, 66 ruffian! qui non son femmine da conio».
query.result:
**English:**
64 Thus speaking, a demon struck him 65 with his whip, and said: "Get going, 66 pimp! There are no whores here to mint coins from."
**Malay:**
64 Demikian berbicara, seekor iblis memukulnya 65 dengan cemeti miliknya, dan berkata: "Pergi, 66 mucikari! Di sini tidak ada pelacur untuk dicetak uang."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
67 I’ mi raggiunsi con la scorta mia; 68 poscia con pochi passi divenimmo 69 là ’v’ uno scoglio de la ripa uscia.
query.result:
**English:**
67 I rejoined my guide; 68 then with a few steps we came 69 to where a cliff jutted out from the bank.
**Malay:**
67 Aku bergabung kembali dengan pemanduku; 68 kemudian dengan beberapa langkah kami sampai 69 di tempat di mana sebuah tebing menjorok keluar dari tepi sungai.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
70 Assai leggeramente quel salimmo; 71 e vòlti a destra su per la sua scheggia, 72 da quelle cerchie etterne ci partimmo.
query.result:
**English:**
70 We climbed it very easily; 71 and, turning to the right, up along its ridge, 72 we departed from those eternal circles.
**Malay:**
70 Kami memanjatnya dengan sangat mudah; 71 dan, berbelok ke kanan di sepanjang punggungnya, 72 kami meninggalkan lingkaran-lingkaran abadi itu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
73 Quando noi fummo là dov’ el vaneggia 74 di sotto per dar passo a li sferzati, 75 lo duca disse: «Attienti, e fa che feggia
76 lo viso in te di quest’ altri mal nati, 77 ai quali ancor non vedesti la faccia 78 però che son con noi insieme andati».
query.result:
**English:**
73 When we were there where he raves 74 from below to give passage to those who are whipped, 75 the leader said: "Pay attention, and make sure that you strike 76 your gaze upon these other ill-born ones, 77 whose faces you have not yet seen, 78 because they have walked with us all along."
**Malay:**
73 Ketika kami berada di tempat di mana dia mengoceh 74 dari bawah untuk memberi jalan kepada mereka yang dicambuk, 75 sang pemimpin berkata: "Perhatikan, dan pastikan bahwa kamu tatap 76 wajah orang-orang jahat lainnya ini, 77 yang wajahnya belum pernah kamu lihat, 78 karena mereka telah berjalan bersama kita selama ini."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
79 Del vecchio ponte guardavam la traccia 80 che venìa verso noi da l’altra banda, 81 e che la ferza similmente scaccia.
query.result:
**English:**
79 From the old bridge I watched the trace 80 that came towards us from the other side, 81 and which the whip similarly drives away.
**Malay:**
79 Dari jembatan tua itu aku melihat jejak 80 yang datang ke arah kami dari sisi yang lain, 81 dan yang dicambuk dengan cara yang sama.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
82 E ’l buon maestro, sanza mia dimanda, 83 mi disse: «Guarda quel grande che vene, 84 e per dolor non par lagrime spanda:
85 quanto aspetto reale ancor ritene! 86 Quelli è Iasón, che per cuore e per senno 87 li Colchi del monton privati féne.
query.result:
**English:**
82 And the good master, without my asking, 83 said to me: "Look at that great one who is coming, 84 and for grief does not seem to shed tears:
85 how much royal bearing he still retains! 86 That is Jason, who by heart and by intellect 87 deprived the Colchians of the ram's fleece.
**Malay:**
82 Dan guru yang baik, tanpa aku bertanya, 83 berkata kepadaku: "Lihatlah orang hebat yang datang itu, 84 dan karena sedih tidak tampak meneteskan air mata:
85 betapa sikap raja masih dipertahankannya! 86 Itulah Jason, yang dengan hati dan akal 87 merampas bulu domba emas dari bangsa Colchis.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
88 Ello passò per l’isola di Lenno 89 poi che l’ardite femmine spietate 90 tutti li maschi loro a morte dienno.
query.result:
**English:**
88 He passed by the island of Lemnos, 89 after the bold and pitiless women 90 put all their men to death.
**Malay:**
88 Dia melewati pulau Lemnos, 89 setelah para wanita yang berani dan kejam itu 90 membunuh semua lelaki mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
91 Ivi con segni e con parole ornate 92 Isifile ingannò, la giovinetta 93 che prima avea tutte l’altre ingannate.
query.result:
**English:**
91 There, with signs and ornate words, 92 Isifile deceived the young girl, 93 who had previously deceived all the others.
**Malay:**
91 Di sana, dengan tanda-tanda dan kata-kata yang indah, 92 Isifile menipu gadis muda itu, 93 yang sebelumnya telah menipu semua yang lain.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
97 Con lui sen va chi da tal parte inganna; 98 e questo basti de la prima valle 99 sapere e di color che ’n sé assanna».
query.result:
**English:**
97 With him goes whoever deceives on that side; 98 and this is enough to know of the first valley 99 and of those who devour themselves within it.
**Malay:**
97 Bersama dianya pergi sesiapa yang menipu di pihak itu; 98 dan ini cukup untuk diketahui tentang lembah pertama 99 dan tentang mereka yang memakan diri mereka sendiri di dalamnya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
100 Già eravam là ’ve lo stretto calle 101 con l’argine secondo s’incrocicchia, 102 e fa di quello ad un altr’ arco spalle.
query.result:
**English:**
100 We were already there where the narrow path 101 intersects with the second bank, 102 and makes a shoulder of that to another arch.
**Malay:**
100 Kami sudah berada di sana di mana jalan yang sempit 101 bersimpangan dengan tebing kedua, 102 dan membuat bahu dari itu ke lengkungan yang lain.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
103 Quindi sentimmo gente che si nicchia 104 ne l’altra bolgia e che col muso scuffa, 105 e sé medesma con le palme picchia.
query.result:
**English:**
103 Then we heard people who were huddled together 104 in the other ditch and who were striking their snouts, 105 and beating themselves with their palms.
**Malay:**
103 Kemudian kami mendengar orang-orang yang berkerumun 104 di parit yang lain dan yang memukul-mukul moncong mereka, 105 dan memukul diri mereka sendiri dengan telapak tangan mereka.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
106 Le ripe eran grommate d’una muffa, 107 per l’alito di giù che vi s’appasta, 108 che con li occhi e col naso facea zuffa.
query.result:
**English:**
106 The banks were overgrown with a mold, 107 because of the breath from below that congealed there, 108 which made war with the eyes and the nose.
**Malay:**
106 Tebing-tebing itu ditumbuhi jamur, 107 karena hembusan napas dari bawah yang membeku di sana, 108 yang berperang dengan mata dan hidung.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
109 Lo fondo è cupo sì, che non ci basta 110 loco a veder sanza montare al dosso 111 de l’arco, ove lo scoglio più sovrasta.
query.result:
**English:**
109 The bottom is so deep that it is not enough for us 110 to see it without climbing to the top 111 of the arch, where the rock overhangs the most.
**Malay:**
109 Dasarnya sangat dalam sehingga tidak cukup bagi kita 110 untuk melihatnya tanpa memanjat ke atas 111 lengkungan, di mana batu paling menjorok.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
112 Quivi venimmo; e quindi giù nel fosso 113 vidi gente attuffata in uno sterco 114 che da li uman privadi parea mosso.
query.result:
**English:**
112 There we came; and then down in the ditch 113 I saw people plunged in excrement 114 that seemed to have moved from there, deprived of humanity.
**Malay:**
112 Di situ kami datang; dan kemudian di bawah di dalam parit 113 kulihat orang-orang terbenam dalam kotoran 114 yang tampaknya telah bergerak dari sana, kehilangan sifat kemanusiaan.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
115 E mentre ch’io là giù con l’occhio cerco, 116 vidi un col capo sì di merda lordo, 117 che non parëa s’era laico o cherco.
query.result:
**English:**
115 And while I searched there with my eyes, 116 I saw someone with his head so smeared with excrement, 117 that it did not appear whether he was a layman or a cleric.
**Malay:**
115 Dan sementara aku mencari di sana dengan mataku, 116 kulihat seseorang dengan kepalanya yang begitu kotor dengan kotoran, 117 sehingga tidak tampak apakah dia seorang awam atau pendeta.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
118 Quei mi sgridò: «Perché se’ tu sì gordo 119 di riguardar più me che li altri brutti?». 120 E io a lui: «Perché, se ben ricordo,
121 già t’ho veduto coi capelli asciutti, 122 e se’ Alessio Interminei da Lucca: 123 però t’adocchio più che li altri tutti».
query.result:
**English:**
118 He shouted at me: "Why are you staring at me more than at the other wretches?" 119 And I to him: "Because, if I remember correctly, 120 I have already seen you with dry hair, 121 and you are Alessio Interminei from Lucca: 122 that's why I pay more attention to you than to all the others."
**Malay:**
118 Dia berteriak kepadaku: "Mengapa kamu menatapku lebih dari pada orang-orang jelek lainnya?" 119 Dan aku kepadanya: "Karena, jika aku ingat dengan benar, 120 aku pernah melihatmu dengan rambut kering, 121 dan kamu adalah Alessio Interminei dari Lucca: 122 oleh karena itu aku lebih memperhatikanmu daripada yang lainnya."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
124 Ed elli allor, battendosi la zucca: 125 «Qua giù m’hanno sommerso le lusinghe 126 ond’ io non ebbi mai la lingua stucca».
query.result:
**English:**
124 And he then, beating his head: 125 "Down here the flatteries have drowned me, 126 from which I never had my tongue sated."
**Malay:**
124 Dan dia kemudian, memukul kepalanya: 125 "Di bawah sini pujian-pujian telah menenggelamkanku, 126 yang darinya aku tidak pernah merasa lidahku puas."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
127 Appresso ciò lo duca «Fa che pinghe», 128 mi disse, «il viso un poco più avante, 129 sì che la faccia ben con l’occhio attinghe
130 di quella sozza e scapigliata fante 131 che là si graffia con l’unghie merdose, 132 e or s’accoscia e ora è in piedi stante.
query.result:
**English:**
127 Then the leader said to me, "Make haste," 128 "to look a little farther ahead, 129 so that your eyes may fully take in
130 the face of that filthy and disheveled serving-woman 131 who scratches herself there with her filthy nails, 132 and now crouches down and now stands up straight.
**Malay:**
127 Kemudian pemimpin itu berkata kepadaku, "Cepatlah," 128 "pandanglah sedikit lebih jauh ke depan, 129 sehingga matamu dapat melihat dengan jelas
130 wajah pelayan wanita yang kotor dan acak-acakan itu 131 yang di sana menggaruk dirinya sendiri dengan kukunya yang kotor, 132 dan sekarang berjongkok dan sekarang berdiri tegak.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
133 Taïde è, la puttana che rispuose 134 al drudo suo quando disse “Ho io grazie 135 grandi apo te?”: “Anzi maravigliose!”.
query.result:
**English:**
133 Thaïs is the whore who replied 134 to her lover when he said “Do I have 135 great favors from you?”: “On the contrary, marvelous ones!”.
**Malay:**
133 Taïde adalah pelacur yang menjawab 134 kepada kekasihnya ketika dia berkata “Apakah aku punya 135 kebaikan yang besar darimu?”: “Sebaliknya, yang luar biasa!”.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Malay.
136 E quinci sian le nostre viste sazie».
query.result:
**English:**
136 And here our gaze was satisfied.
**Malay:**
136 Dan di sinilah pandangan kami puas.
